results.content:
Der Kurs war ein Guter Einstieg im WEB IDE.
Nur leider sind bei den 22 Videos jeweils mindestens 1 Minute verschwendet. Am Anfang mit dem Redner, wo man Ihn folgen kann und Ende das man den Kurs bewerten soll. Wirklich bei jeden Video!
Das streckt den Kurs unglaublich in die länge und täuscht mehr Inhalt vor.
Ansonsten ein schöner kurzer Einstiegskurs.

results.content: Good content and exposure to UI5; but if you've had no former UI5 exposure it wasn't (at least for me) enough to learn detailed programming.  For a 1.5 hour course though it was good and what I expected.  One other comment would be that the Intro and Outro are not needed in every single video lesson.
results.content_html: Good content and exposure to UI5; but if you've had no former UI5 exposure it wasn't (at least for me) enough to learn detailed programming. For a 1.5 hour course though it was good and what I expected. One other comment would be that the Intro and Outro are not needed in every single video lesson.

results.content: Nice training for Beginners ! It kicks me to learn more.
results.content_html: Nice training for Beginners ! It kicks me to learn more.

results.content: no proper explanation, just too tough to interpret the trainer's words since he has got a lot of MTI!! Also, he seems to be in a hurry and jumps fast and keeps on advertising about his own self in every video lesson which is a big setback! WASTE OF TIME, TO BE HONEST! Sorry but not sorry!
